scripts.android-bundle-release: export ENVFILE=.env.pro && cd android && npm run android-clean-resources && ./gradlew app:bundleRelease && cd ..
scripts.android-build-release: export ENVFILE=.env.pro && cd android && npm run android-clean-resources &&./gradlew app:assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.android-build-debug: export ENVFILE=.env && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.android-clean-resources: cd android && rm -rf app/src/main/res/raw/ && rm -rf app/src/main/res/drawable-h* && rm -rf app/src/main/res/drawable-m* && rm -rf app/src/main/res/drawable-xh* && rm -rf app/src/main/res/drawable-xxh* && rm -rf app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi/node_*
scripts.android-generate-key: cd android/app && keytool -genkeypair -v -keystore android-release-key.keystore -alias base-project-app-key -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000
scripts.android-link-assets: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --reset-cache --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.ios-pod-repo-update: cd ios && pod repo update && cd ..
scripts.project-clean: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && npm cache clean
scripts.project-clean-start: npm run clean && npm run rc-start
scripts.project-fresh-install: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf ios/build/ModuleCache/* && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm cache clean && npm install
scripts.project-fresh-start: npm run fresh-install && npm run rc-start
